item.title: DIS
item.description: score:82 Chances: ISS’s endorsement of Nelson Peltz’s bid for a board seat indicates a possible shift in Disney’s governance and decision-making process. The support of influential proxy advisors and business leaders for Nelson Peltz suggests potential future changes in Disney’s direction and strategy.
